snippet: In homage to the Roman Baroque period, Fernando and Humberto Campana designed a sofa of Mongolian lamb girded by ribbons of bronze sculpture.
abstract: Limited edition Anhanguera sofa by Fernando and Humberto Campana is part of the brothers' Brazilian Baroque collection, commissioned by Galleria O in Rome, and can be seen at the gallery Les Arts Decoratifs in Paris.
lead_paragraph: In homage to the Roman Baroque period, Fernando and Humberto Campana designed a sofa of Mongolian lamb girded by ribbons of bronze sculpture.

headline.seo: A Limited-Edition Mongolian Lamb Sofa From the Campana Brothers
headline.main: Evoking Decadence With a Wild Touch
headline.print_headline: Evoking Decadence With a Wild Touch
